member.name: NMCUSTOMTEXT
member.summary: Contains information used with custom text notification.

member.name: NMCUSTOMTEXT.hdr
member.summary: An structure that contains additional information about this notification.

member.name: NMCUSTOMTEXT.hDC
member.summary: The device context to draw to.

member.name: NMCUSTOMTEXT.uFormat
member.summary: One or more of the DT_* flags. For more information, see the description of the uFormat parameter of the function. This may be NULL.

member.name: NMCUSTOMTEXT.fLink
member.summary: Whether the text is a link.
